article: A terrible earthquake happened in Wenchuan on May 12, 2008.  _  people lost their lives and homes. During those days, we could hear a lot of stories about  _  . Here is  _  of them. After the earthquake, under a fallen building, some soldiers found that a  _  died in a very strange way. When they were ready to take her away, they were surprised to find that a baby in her arms was still  _  . The baby was sleeping and  _  hurt at all. Between the dead mother  _  the living baby, there was a cellphone with a short  _  on the screen, "My dear baby, if you can survive , remember that I love you." Everybody  _  when they read these words. Besides this story, many other stories also moved us deeply.  _  these stories, we learn more about love. You're lucky if you're loved by others. You're great if you love others when you're in danger.
